free_txt: Jimin Wang (CNDC)
The data received from Zhizhou Ren

bib_record.title: Measurement of the 236,238U(n,f) cross sections from the threshold to 200 MeV at CSNS Back-n

free_txt: University of South China, Hengyang
Xi'an Jiaotong University, Xi'an
The Back-n white neutron source at
China Spallation Neutron Source (CSNS)
The correction for nonuniformity, neutron flux
attenuation, dead time and overlap, and isotope
impurities.
A multi-cell fast fission ionization chamber,
was aligned with the center of the beam line with a
1.0 mm positioning error and filled with a gas
mixture of 90% Ar and 10% CH4 at a pressure of 800
mbar. A stack of fission cells was mounted along the
direction of the neutron beam inside the chamber. An
8-channel preamplifier MSI-8 was chosen for the
detection system.
The Back-n white neutron source at
China Spallation Neutron Source (CSNS)
The neutron flux is 7.03E6 n/cm2/s at 100 kW,
which has an energy spectrum spanning from 0.5 eV to
200 MeV with the in-beam cadmium filter.
The measurement was performed in the normal
double-bunch mode with an interval of 410 ns and
the proton bunches power was about 20 kW, where each
Gauss-type bunch had a length of about 41 ns (FWHM).
The neutron beam spot diameter was 60 mm.
Flight distance of 76 m.
The uranium fission materials were electroplated on
the backings of 20 um thick stainless steel in the
form of U3O8 and the diameter of the deposit is about
50 mm. Three 235U samples were enriched over 99.99,
with a weight of 5.173 mg, 5.707 mg and 5.633 mg, a
diameter of 4.974 cm, 4.976 cm and 4.964 cm, a
thickness of 0.266 mg/cm2, 0.293 mg/cm2 and 0.291
mg/cm2, respectively. One 236U sample was enriched
over 99.94, with a weight of 2.210 mg, a diameter of
4.969 cm and a thickness of 0.114 mg/cm2. Three 238U
samples were enriched over 99.99, with a weight of
4.991 mg, 4.987 mg and 4.724 mg, a diameter of 4.988
cm, 4.968 cm and 4.932 cm, a thickness of 0.255
mg/cm2, 0.257 mg/cm2 and 0.247 mg/cm2, respectively.

59,5,2023 were presented by author.
